values.desc: This is called when a chunk of audio is ready for consumption.

values.code: onBeginSynthesis(utteranceId: String!, sampleRateInHz: Int, audioFormat: Int, channelCount: Int)
values.desc: Called when the TTS engine begins to synthesize the audio for a request.
Called when an utterance has successfully completed processing.
Called when an error has occurred during processing.
Called when an error has occurred during processing.

values.code: onRangeStart(utteranceId: String!, start: Int, end: Int, frame: Int)
values.desc: This is called when the TTS service is about to speak the specified range of the utterance with the given utteranceId.
Called when an utterance "starts" as perceived by the caller.
Called when an utterance has been stopped while in progress or flushed from the synthesis queue.
